page.title: 19Farming
page.content: There are quite a lot of farmers in the area.The crops you are most likely to see in the area are wheat, barley,lucerne and peas.There is some rough grazing land for cattle.Much of the land in our area is farmland although the golf_course takes up 120 acres.There are a number of farms in Latchingdon and Fambridge.Wheat seems to be the most common crop there. We went to a farm to get this information for the Domesday_Survey and on the farm we visited lucerne was grown. The owner was {Jack Clear}He rents {76}acres.He has lived there since 1958.Lucerne is a green crop high in protein used for animal food.
